main event: A civilian reported seeing a round, glowing object moving erratically in the sky near Leesburg, Florida on April 30, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to slow down, then move erratically to the left, right, up and down.
The object suddenly accelerated at a very high rate of speed and disappeared from sight.
The witness immediately told his wife and son about the sighting, but the object had vanished by the time they looked.
There was no sound associated with the object.
The officer who investigated the incident stated he was quite convinced of the reality of what the observers reported, though he could offer no explanation as to what the object actually was.
